channel.title: Monerica - Newest and Sponsored Listings
channel.description: The latest additions and sponsors in our directory.

item.title: BIM Finance
item.description: Exchanges > Non-KYC Exchanges : Buy and sell Monero from a bank account.

item.title: AxeSwap
item.description: Exchanges > Atomic Swaps : Atomic Cross-Chain Exchange

item.title: PastEarn
item.description: Businesses > Miscellaneous : The only Monero-paying paste/link site. It also has a leaderboard. Built by the team behind PaySkip.ORG

item.title: The Monero Book
item.description: Education > Knowledge : Documents the Monero protocol. Currently, work is being done to document Monero's consensus rules.

item.title: Haveno Dawnswap
item.description: Exchanges > Peer-to-Peer Exchanges : A decentralized open-source non-custodial peer-to-peer exchange platform built with Monero and Tor at its core. It is based on the open-source Haveno Network. - Note: Monero is the base currency for all trading pairs. All fiat currency supported and many payment methods available for traders to offer and use. - Location: Worldwide - Contact: https://github.com/dawn-collective/haveno-dawn/

item.title: ✅ SPAR
item.description: Businesses > Food & Drink (IRL) : A multinational franchise that provides branding, supplies and support services for independently owned and operated food retail stores. - Note: See locations map - Processor: DFX

item.title: Casa Lunarito
item.description: Businesses > Hotels/ Accommodations : Discover our boutique hotel, a place where Andalusian tradition blends with modern comforts, located in the heart of the historic center of Vejer de la Frontera (Spain). - Location: San Filmo 2, 11150 Vejer de la Frontera, Cádiz, Spain

item.title: ✅ BitonCard
item.description: Businesses > Giftcards/ Pre-Paid Cards : Anonymous Mastercard that you can load with crypto and spend online worldwide. 3DS supported. - Processor: Heleket/Cryptomus - Contact: support@bitoncard.com
